importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The article does not specify a release date for the series, only that it is 'coming soon'.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The series begins in the 1930s and spans to 1956, covering the formative years of the Kennedy family, including the rise of Jack Kennedy and the early years of the family’s political influence.

keyTakeAways: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956'.
The series stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the triumphs and tragedies of the Kennedy family across generations.
The show begins in the 1930s and chronicles the rise of Joe and Rose Kennedy and their nine children, including Jack Kennedy, who struggles to escape the shadow of his older brother.
The series is described as a blend of American mythology and human drama, offering insight into both the Kennedys and broader American history and values.
The show is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story,' which focuses on JFK Jr.
The series will run for eight episodes and has not yet been assigned a release date.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy', based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956', which will star Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr. The series begins in the 1930s and explores the rise and tragedies of the Kennedy family, including Jack Kennedy’s struggles against the shadow of his older brother. It is described as a blend of American myth and human drama, offering insight into both the family’s legacy and broader historical trends. The show will consist of eight episodes and is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story', which focuses on JFK Jr. The series has not yet been released, and its exact release date is pending.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
